page.title: 01Gazetteer
page.content:
The area covered by our block is mainly{Cheshire}farmland. The main road running from North to South connects{Crewe}with the market town of {Sandbach}and the M6. There is a village,{Wheelock}where the canal and old railway crosses the road, and two small hamlets,{Wheelock Heath}and {Winterley}further South.
There used to be salt-mining in the area but all that is left are the Flashes where water has filled in the holes. There are two factories left and twenty eight farms. There are two new housing estates in the area, one in Wheelock and the other in Winterley. The land is mostly low lying and flat.
